sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Product, products} from "../products"; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'] }) export class ProductListComponent { products = products }

{{product.name}}

Description:
{{product.description}}

Price: {{product.price | currency: '₸'}}

Rating: {{product.rating}}
